item.title: 悟透JavaScript笔记
item.description: 原生闭包 function Person(firstName, lastName, age) { //私有变量： var _firstName = firstName; var _lastName = lastName; //公共变量: this.age = age; //方法： this.getName = function() { return(firstName + " " + lastName); }; this.SayHello = function() { alert("Hello, I'm " + firstName + " " + lastName); }; }; var BillGates = new
